pygeotoolbox.database.sqltemplating.sqlcommands module¶

class pygeotoolbox.database.sqltemplating.sqlcommands.SQLCommands(connection=None, sqlFileName=None, file=None)[source]¶

SQL commands/queries binder class.

clearBuffer()[source]¶

Executes all commands in SQL buffer.

execute(commandName, **kwargs)[source]¶

Executes command commanName with arguments specified

Parameters:
  • commandName (str) – command name to be executed
  • kwargs – command parameters to be aplied
executeSelectSQL(queryName, **kwargs)[source]¶

Selects query queryName with arguments specified.

Parameters:
  • queryName (str) – query name to be executed
  • kwargs – command parameters to be aplied
load(fileName, doAppend=True, encoding='utf-8')[source]¶

Loads and parses SQL script from sql string and creates commands and queries binders.

Parameters:
  • fileName (str) – file name to be loaded
  • doAppend (bool) – if False, then deletes all existing binders
  • encoding (str) – file encoding, “utf-8” as a default value
loads(sql, doAppend=True)[source]¶

Parses SQL script from sql string and creates commands and queries binders.

Parameters:
  • sql (str) – SQL sequence with commands and queries definition
  • doAppend (bool) – if False, then deletes all existing binders
setBufferSize(size)[source]¶

Set SQL buffer to given size.

Parameters:size (int) – number of buffer items

CURSOR = 0¶
FIRST_RECORD_CONTENT = 1¶
class pygeotoolbox.database.sqltemplating.sqlprocedure.SQLProcedure(sqlCommands, template)[source]¶

Class holding strored SQL procedure.

execute(values)[source]¶

Compiles SQL command from template and given parameter values, then execute it and commit.

executeSelectSQL(values)[source]¶

Compiles SQL query from template and given parameter values, then execute query and returns cursor on result.

getSQL(*args, **kwargs)[source]¶

Extracts parameters from args and kwargs, apply them into template and return result.

getSQLfromValues(values)[source]¶

Replaces values in a template by given parameters.

getValues(*args, **kwargs)[source]¶

Extracts values from args and kwargs.

nameToId(name)[source]¶

Extracts identifier from name.

Parameters:name – name to be parsed
Returns:identifier parsed from name
